Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.controller

Class BudgetManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.group12.flus.controller.BudgetManager
public class BudgetManager extends Object
The class represents a budget manager, and is responsible for everything related to the account's budgets.
Since:
April 12, 2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ramtin Samavat and Stian Str√¶te

  • Constructor Details

    • BudgetManager

      public BudgetManager()
      Constructor for making an object of BudgetManger. The constructor initializes the list of accounts.

  • Method Details

    • createBudget

      public void createBudget(String username, String budgetId) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException
      The method creates a new budget with the specified ID and adds it to the account with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account to add the budget to.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to create.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if account or budgetId is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if a budget with the same ID already exists in the account.

    • deleteBudget

      public boolean deleteBudget(String username, String budgetId) throws NullPointerException, NoSuchElementException
      The method deletes the budget with the specified ID from the account with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account to remove the budget from.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the budget was successfully removed, and false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if account of budgetId is null.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account does not exist.

    • addIncomeToBudget

      public void addIncomeToBudget(String username, String budgetId, String description, double amount) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException
      The method adds income to the specified budget in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account containing the budget.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to which the income is to be added.
      description - the description of the income.
      amount - the amount of the income.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either the username, budgetId, or description is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the description is blank or if the amount is below zero.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account or the budget does not exist.

    • removeIncomeFromBudget

      public boolean removeIncomeFromBudget(String username, String budgetId, Income income) throws NullPointerException, NoSuchElementException
      The method removes income from the specified budget in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account containing the budget.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to which the income is to be removed.
      income - the income to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the income was successfully removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either the username, budgetId, or income is null.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account or the budget does not exist.

    • addExpenseToBudget

      public void addExpenseToBudget(String username, String budgetId, String description, double amount) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException
      The method adds expense to the specified budget in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account containing the budget.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to which the expense is to be added.
      description - the description of the expense.
      amount - the amount of the expense.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either the username, budgetId, or description is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the description is blank or if the amount is below zero.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account or the budget does not exist.

    • removeExpenseFromBudget

      public boolean removeExpenseFromBudget(String username, String budgetId, Expense expense) throws NullPointerException, NoSuchElementException
      The method removes expense from the specified budget in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account containing the budget.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to which the expense is to be removed.
      expense - the expense to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the expense was successfully removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either the username, budgetId, or description is null.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account or the budget does not exist.

    • addGoalToBudget

      public void addGoalToBudget(String username, String budgetId, double goalValue) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchElementException
      The method adds goal to the specified budget in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account containing the budget.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to which the goal is to be added.
      goalValue - the value of the goal.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the username or the budgetId is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is below zero or is already used.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account or the budget does not exist.

    • removeGoalFromBudget

      public boolean removeGoalFromBudget(String username, String budgetId, double goalValue) throws NullPointerException, NoSuchElementException
      The method removes goal from the specified budget in the account associated with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username associated with the account containing the budget.
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to which the goal is to be removed.
      goalValue - the value of the goal.
      Returns:
      true if the goal was successfully removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the username or the budgetId is null.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account or the budget does not exist.

    • getBudget

      public Budget getBudget(String username, String budgetId) throws NullPointerException, NoSuchElementException, UnsupportedOperationException
      The method retrieves a deep copy of the Budget object corresponding to the specified username and budget ID.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the account with the budget.
      budgetId - the budget ID of the budget to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the Budget object.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either username or budgetID is null.
      NoSuchElementException - if the account does not exist.
      UnsupportedOperationException - if cloning is not supported.
